data.text:
It was spring when I was finally accepted into Tracen Academy. My 
mother was so happy when she saw the academy's brochure.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>It was spring when I was finally accepted into Tracen Academy. My 
<story>mother was so happy when she saw the academy's brochure.

data.text:
“This academy seems to have various events to show their 
appreciation towards their students. Look, they even have 
Halloween and Christmas parties for the dorms!”
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>“This academy seems to have various events to show their 
<story>appreciation towards their students. Look, they even have 
<story>Halloween and Christmas parties for the dorms!”

data.text:
“I'm sure you'll make a lot of friends there, Rob Roy-chan. I 
hope you make the most out of your time at Tracen Academy.”
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>“I'm sure you'll make a lot of friends there, Rob Roy-chan. I 
<story>hope you make the most out of your time at Tracen Academy.”

data.text:
(…First impressions are very important when it comes to making 
friends. That's why I practiced introducing myself. I should go 
and reach out to some people…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(…First impressions are very important when it comes to making 
<story>friends. That's why I practiced introducing myself. I should go 
<story>and reach out to some people…)

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――――

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>…………

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……

data.text: Ughh… Why am I so…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ughh… Why am I so…

data.text: Ah…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah…

data.text:
(Ah, that's right! If you live in a dormitory, you're meant to 
have a roommate! So she must be…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Ah, that's right! If you live in a dormitory, you're meant to 
<story>have a roommate! So she must be…)

data.text: U-Umm…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>U-Umm…

data.text: I… Umm…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>I… Umm…

data.text:
(If I suddenly ask her to be my friend… won't she just think 
that I'm some weird Uma Musume?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(If I suddenly ask her to be my friend… won't she just think 
<story>that I'm some weird Uma Musume?)

data.text:
(If you tell someone that you'd like for them to be your friend 
it's the same as telling them you don't have any friends… If I 
were to confess something that embarrassing, she would 
definitely keep her distance from me…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(If you tell someone that you'd like for them to be your friend 
<story>it's the same as telling them you don't have any friends… If I 
<story>were to confess something that embarrassing, she would 
<story>definitely keep her distance from me…)

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: (Squeeze…)
data.processed: <story>(Squeeze…)

data.text: Huh…?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Huh…?

data.text:
S-Sorry… It's just that, when I would get nervous my mother would 
hold my hands… and that usually made me feel better…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>S-Sorry… It's just that, when I would get nervous my mother would 
<story>hold my hands… and that usually made me feel better…

data.text: I-I'm so sorry…! I did something weird didn't I…!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>I-I'm so sorry…! I did something weird didn't I…!

data.text: N-No, it was nothing like that! I… Umm… Err…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>N-No, it was nothing like that! I… Umm… Err…!

data.text: Would you be willing to be my friend…?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Would you be willing to be my friend…?

data.text:
(Whenever Rice-san did something like this, 
it was always for someone else's sake…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(Whenever Rice-san did something like this, 
<story>it was always for someone else's sake…)

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: (I think Rice-san wants to speak with Bourbon-san…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(I think Rice-san wants to speak with Bourbon-san…)

data.text:
(I'm sure I'm right about this. But despite knowing, 
all I can do is stand and watch. There's nothing 
I can do to help, after all.)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I'm sure I'm right about this. But despite knowing, 
<story>all I can do is stand and watch. There's nothing 
<story>I can do to help, after all.)

data.text:
(It would be strange if I suddenly went up to Rice-san 
and Bourbon-san… Not to mention, since it's me I 
would just end up confusing them both. I need someone 
better at talking than I am…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(It would be strange if I suddenly went up to Rice-san 
<story>and Bourbon-san… Not to mention, since it's me I 
<story>would just end up confusing them both. I need someone 
<story>better at talking than I am…)

data.text: (But what I really need… What I really need to do is…)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>(But what I really need… What I really need to do is…)

data.text:
Ah… A transformation, a masquerade… The ability to become someone 
different from yourself… In a dream-like place…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah… A transformation, a masquerade… The ability to become someone 
<story>different from yourself… In a dream-like place…

data.text:
A place brimming with costumes and endless stories… 
A country of dreams that will only be here for 
a limited time… Halloween Land…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>A place brimming with costumes and endless stories… 
<story>A country of dreams that will only be here for 
<story>a limited time… Halloween Land…!

data.text: This is it…! If I could get everyone to come here…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>This is it…! If I could get everyone to come here…!

data.text:
It seems as though presently there is an error regarding the 
planning of the Halloween party… Analysis of past information 
is required in order to properly complete the mission.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>It seems as though presently there is an error regarding the 
<story>planning of the Halloween party… Analysis of past information 
<story>is required in order to properly complete the mission.

data.text:
Calculating the possibility of failure after one week. 
Arrangements for the props, which were a concern, have 
completed. Therefore, I surmise that it is not the application 
of my plans that causes failure, but something more fundamental…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Calculating the possibility of failure after one week. 
<story>Arrangements for the props, which were a concern, have 
<story>completed. Therefore, I surmise that it is not the application 
<story>of my plans that causes failure, but something more fundamental…

data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>……

data.text:
I tried to talk to Bourbon-san last night… but when Tamamo-san 
and Creek-san appeared so suddenly…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I tried to talk to Bourbon-san last night… but when Tamamo-san 
<story>and Creek-san appeared so suddenly…

data.text:
I was worried that if I suddenly showed up I would 
just get in everyone's way… I was so scared… My 
legs were shaking… Then I realized…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I was worried that if I suddenly showed up I would 
<story>just get in everyone's way… I was so scared… My 
<story>legs were shaking… Then I realized…

data.text:
(I need to stop this… There's no point 
in being worried all of the time…)
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>(I need to stop this… There's no point 
<story>in being worried all of the time…)

data.text:
(But at the same time, calling out to you 
so suddenly would probably upset you…)
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>(But at the same time, calling out to you 
<story>so suddenly would probably upset you…)

data.text: Y-You two…!! Become my familiars!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Y-You two…!! Become my familiars!!

data.text: Ehh…? Huh…?
data.name: Rice & Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Ehh…? Huh…?

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: That was meant for the two of you…!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>That was meant for the two of you…!

data.text: Eh!? M-Me…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Eh!? M-Me…?

data.text:
Yes, I have something to request of the two of 
you! Come with me to an amusement park!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Yes, I have something to request of the two of 
<story>you! Come with me to an amusement park!

data.text:
This amusement park is hosting a Halloween event, 
but going alone would be no fun. We did promise 
one another we'd help each other, didn't we?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>This amusement park is hosting a Halloween event, 
<story>but going alone would be no fun. We did promise 
<story>one another we'd help each other, didn't we?

data.text:
I've also heard that this amusement park is sooo much fun! It 
seems that the former head of the planning committee, Inari-san, 
used this as a reference for the party she threw!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>I've also heard that this amusement park is sooo much fun! It 
<story>seems that the former head of the planning committee, Inari-san, 
<story>used this as a reference for the party she threw!

data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>……!

data.text:
Anyways, it seems like an amazing 
place. I want to go so bad, so…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, it seems like an amazing 
<story>place. I want to go so bad, so…

data.text: Become my familiars and come with me!! D-Do you understand!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Become my familiars and come with me!! D-Do you understand!?

data.text:
Tamamo-senpaii! Please help me! You see, 
I was trying to fix this frayed hem…
data.name: Ritto Student
data.processed:
<story>Tamamo-senpaii! Please help me! You see, 
<story>I was trying to fix this frayed hem…

data.text: Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Ahh, no worries! I'll take care of it, so just leave it there.

data.text:
Now all we need to do is check the costumes for the Miho 
dormitory, right…? I need to gather the girls who haven't 
finished their costume fittings.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Now all we need to do is check the costumes for the Miho 
<story>dormitory, right…? I need to gather the girls who haven't 
<story>finished their costume fittings.

data.text:
Okay. Things are going great. I'll go and check 
on Bourbon to see if she needs any help…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Okay. Things are going great. I'll go and check 
<story>on Bourbon to see if she needs any help…

data.text:
I heard that Bourbon-san went to that insanely scary 
amusement park! Did she go there to collect data cause 
she's been stressing about the Halloween party?
data.name: Horsegirl A
data.processed:
<story>I heard that Bourbon-san went to that insanely scary 
<story>amusement park! Did she go there to collect data cause 
<story>she's been stressing about the Halloween party?

data.text:
Eh? Who'd she go with? I don't think she'd go alone… but at 
the same time when I offered to help her before, she refused… 
Jeez, I wish she'd learn to rely on us some more.
data.name: Horsegirl B
data.processed:
<story>Eh? Who'd she go with? I don't think she'd go alone… but at 
<story>the same time when I offered to help her before, she refused… 
<story>Jeez, I wish she'd learn to rely on us some more.

data.text:
She's… at it again, ain't she… 
Damnit… Creek, you comin' too?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>She's… at it again, ain't she… 
<story>Damnit… Creek, you comin' too?

data.text: Hehe, well of course! I'll go and get ready♪
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>Hehe, well of course! I'll go and get ready♪

data.text:
Woah, there's so many pumpkins! They're so cute…! 
And the dancers are wearing such poofy outfits…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Woah, there's so many pumpkins! They're so cute…! 
<story>And the dancers are wearing such poofy outfits…

data.text:
Hehe, that's not where we are headed. Ah… Umm… 
You two, come along now! The place we're headed is…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, that's not where we are headed. Ah… Umm… 
<story>You two, come along now! The place we're headed is…

data.text: Braaaains…
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Braaaains…

data.text: (Skrrrrrt… Skrrrrrt… Squeeeaak…)
data.name: Mysterious Sound
data.processed: <story>(Skrrrrrt… Skrrrrrt… Squeeeaak…)

data.text: Th-This is the pla-…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Th-This is the pla-…

data.text: (Pshhhh! Brrrrmm…)
data.processed: <story>(Pshhhh! Brrrrmm…)

data.text: Everyone, hold onto your tails! Hurry! Or they'll be grabbed!!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Everyone, hold onto your tails! Hurry! Or they'll be grabbed!!

data.text: Kyaaaaa!!
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaaa!!

data.text: Kyaaaa!?
data.name: Rice & Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaa!?

data.text: Rice-san!? Rob Roy-san!?
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Rice-san!? Rob Roy-san!?

data.text:
An echoing scream rang through the night. Rice Shower and 
Zenno Rob Roy managed to escape. Unable to be stopped by 
Mihono Bourbon, those 2 wandered into a city crawling with zombies.
data.processed:
<story>An echoing scream rang through the night. Rice Shower and 
<story>Zenno Rob Roy managed to escape. Unable to be stopped by 
<story>Mihono Bourbon, those 2 wandered into a city crawling with zombies.

data.text:
The 3 of them have wandered into the frightening 
Halloween zone. What awaited them there was…
data.processed:
<story>The 3 of them have wandered into the frightening 
<story>Halloween zone. What awaited them there was…
